titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation whereas by virtue of the treaty of peace and commerce concluded between His Late Majesty King Charles the Second, and the Bashaw Dey Aga and governors of the city and kingdom of Algiers the tenth day of April one thousand six hundred eighty two ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William III)
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Hampton-Court the ninth day of June, 1700, in the twelfth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.

person.persName: Charles Bill and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd
